title: Tommaso & Shoghi：昨日修复的漏洞
author: BensonQC
txt_content:
Tommaso & Shoghi：
Yay, I’ve fixed the bug that ate your progress in MCPE. And it turns out that actually they were 4, and in my code :(
If you crashed while switching armor in the armor screen, well, it won't happen anymore on #mcpe 0.11
Oh, and yesterday's fix also fixes crashes on the furnace screen :D
Thank you random Twitter user for reminding me
Tommaso & Shoghi：
耶，我修复了在MCPE中“吃”掉你进程的漏洞。但事实上它们有四个，在我的代码中 :(
如果你在装备屏幕中切换装备时崩溃，不要紧，这不会发生在MCPE 0.11中。
噢，昨天也修复了在熔炉界面的崩溃 :D 感谢推特的用户提醒我。
